title: 9News Sydney | Thursday November 6 | Full Episode
description: Georgie Gardner leads the bulletin with major news, including the conviction of Danny Zayat for the murder of Tatiana Dokhotaru, tragic details following a fatal cherry picker crash into a Lithgow bridge, and an urgent update on a Blacktown dog attack leaving a man fighting for his life. We also cover the major Tangara rail fleet refurbishment, Australia's plans for a new Centre for Disease Control (CDC), and a new trial of ID plates on e-bikes at a Sutherland Shire school. title: 9News Adelaide | Thursday November 6 | Full Episode
description: Brenton Ragless and Kate Collins lead the Adelaide news, with police launching a massive fresh search near Mount Gambier in the cold case of Margaret Bernie, who vanished nearly four decades ago. Also in the news, an Adelaide coach faces justice after admitting to child sex crimes, a major deal brings China Eastern flights direct to Adelaide, and a safety update on the algal bloom crisis on South Australian beaches.
